Title: Relates to the withholding of salaries of elected officials who have been indicted on charges of any crimes related to their public office
Summary: Relates to the withholding of salaries of elected officials who have been indicted on charges of any crimes related to their public office.
LawCode: Ren Art 8 to be Art 9, add Art 8 §§112 - 114, Pub Off L; add §§190.95, 220.52 & 310.90, amd §290.10, CP L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public officers law and the criminal procedure law, in relation to the withholding of salaries of elected officials who have been indicted on charges of any crimes related to their public office
